titleStmt.title: The declaration of Mr. Alexander Henderson, principall minister of the word of God at Edenbrough, and chiefe commissioner from the Kirk of Scotland to the Parliament and Synod of England: made upon his death-bed.
titleStmt.author: Henderson, Alexander, 1583?-1646.

titleStmt.title: The declaration of Mr. Alexander Henderson, principall minister of the word of God at Edenbrough, and chiefe commissioner from the Kirk of Scotland to the Parliament and Synod of England: made upon his death-bed.

notesStmt.note: The first leaf features patristic and Biblical passages.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
